content.p: We manage the research and knowledge exchange (RKE) portfolio (approximately £900 million in active research, training and KE grants) in collaboration with the academic community, and deliver against institutional and external key performance indicators in order to ensure the university’s compliance with major funders and government agencies. Major and strategic research development and strategic relationships with funders The management and administration of research projects throughout the research project lifecycle Support with the identification, protection and commercial exploitation of University Intellectual Property Improving performance through strategic delivery planning and data/performance analytics Engage with businesses to deliver knowledge exchange Support, training and expertise for our research community Access comprehensive support throughout the lifecycle of your research and innovation project Get in touch: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH
